A stack of books: In the beginning was the ball, and whole world inside this ball. Except it, there was nothing. Gradually, the ball began to increase, emerged bipolar energy. Then a energy has become a material substance. Light energy became a woman. She called herself Einhasad. Dark became a man. He called himself Gran Kain. There are light and dark.
